DOC.detailed_description: A Phase I , Randomized , Placebo-controlled , Single-center Study Assess Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics AZD0914 After Single Oral Administration Assess Effect Food Healthy Adult Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female ( nonchildbearing potential ) subject age 18 to55 year ( inclusive ) . Have body mass index ( BMI ) 18.00 30.50 kg/m2 weigh least 50 kg 100 kg Male subject willing use barrier contraception , ie , condom , day dose administration least 3 month dose administration IP History important clinically significant disease disorder , opinion PI , may either put subject risk participation study , influence result subject 's ability participate study History presence gastrointestinal , hepatic renal disease condition know interfere absorption , distribution , metabolism , excretion drug Any clinically important illness , medical/surgical procedure , trauma within 4 week first administration IP judge PI History gastrointestinal ulcer disease , inflammatory bowel disease , indigestion symptom > 3 time week , blood stool previous 6 month relate anal trauma
